actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to exclude from admission into and to deport from the United States all aliens who persecuted others on the basis of religion, race, national origin, or political opinion.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Amends the Immigration and Nationality Act to exclude from admission into, and to allow for the deportation from, the United States any alien who, in association with any government, persecuted others on the basis of religion, race, national origin or political opinion.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to exclude from admission into and to deport from the United States all aliens who persecuted others on the basis of religion, race, national origin, or political opinion.
